geometry.planar

Class IntPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.planar.Point
      • geometry.planar.IntPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class IntPoint
extends Point
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implementation of the abstract class Point as a tuple of integers.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • fortyfive_degree_projection

        public IntPoint fortyfive_degree_projection(IntPoint p_other)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a IntPoint object.

      • fortyfive_degree_corner

        public IntPoint fortyfive_degree_corner(IntPoint p_to_point,
                                        boolean p_left_turn)
        Calculates a corner point p so that the lines through this point and p and from p to p_to_point are multiples of 45 degree, and that the angle at p will be 45 degree. If p_left_turn, p_to_point will be on the left of the line from this point to p, else on the right. Returns null, if the line from this point to p_to_point is already a multiple of 45 degree.
        Parameters:
        p_to_point - a IntPoint object.
        p_left_turn - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a IntPoint object.

      • ninety_degree_corner

        public IntPoint ninety_degree_corner(IntPoint p_to_point,
                                     boolean p_left_turn)
        Calculates a corner point p so that the lines through this point and p and from p to p_to_point are hprizontal or vertical, and that the angle at p will be 90 degree. If p_left_turn, p_to_point will be on the left of the line from this point to p, else on the right. Returns null, if the line from this point to p_to_point is already orthogonal.
        Parameters:
        p_to_point - a IntPoint object.
        p_left_turn - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a IntPoint object.
